title: Morning Becomes Eclectic Finally Gets a Podcast
content:
Having lived in LA for a couple years during my youth I encountered [KCRW](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106071024/http:/www.kcrw.com/), a public (non-commercial) radio station based out of Santa Monica College that happens to have a consistently excellent music show, [Morning Becomes Eclectic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106071024/http:/phobos.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewPodcast?id=76016777) with host Nic Harcourt. The show always involves the band coming in the studio for a live 40 minute session.

Well, they've always had Real Audio streams (which have had sub-par quality over the years) but they've recently made the show available as a [Podcast](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106071024/http:/phobos.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewPodcast?id=76016777) (Link requires iTunes).

Recent bands include Clap Your Hands and Say Yeah and a gem out of Tijuana, called Nortec Collective. Yum.
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: Thanks Joe! I've been praying for this too.
